reviews.text: It's worth noting there are two hotels with the same name. This review is for the second hotel Ochsen. Brand new and modern. Good size room and very comfortable. Great location for skiing. The price includes a lift pass and breakfast and service is friendly, I actually checked in several hours early.
reviews.title: Ochsen 2 Review

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Around the corner from Davos Platz train station stand the Ochsen Hotel with it's popular "hot stone" steak restaurant and next to it, it's newer more modern sister the Ochsen 2. I've never stayed in the original hotel but the "zwei" is perfect for those looking for a reasonably priced ski break.
reviews.title: Ochsen 2. Modern, spacious, comfortable and great value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked a two night package with three day lift pass - through the official Davos website, and all I can say is the total price was the equivalent of 2, 3 day ski passes (and so the hotel was basically free).
reviews.title: Clean rooms, nice staff, but overprized

reviews.text: The rooms are spacious; perfect for storing all your bulky ski gear, comfortable; just right after a hard day on the slopes and modern; flat-screen TV (don't expect more than BBC World in English) and a great shower.
reviews.title: Ochsen 2 at Davos , Talstrasse 12

reviews.text: Breakfast is typical continental buffet style but excellent quality, served next door in the restaurant, so yes you have to go outside and watch out for the ice on the pavement.
reviews.title: Unpolite and not flexible at all. I'll never come back again!
